topic.title: N1QL Queries Using the Node.js SDK with Couchbase Server

body.p: To issue N1QL queries you must pass an couchbase.N1qlQuery object to the Bucket.query() function which will then send the query to the cluster and invoke the passed callback.
The callback is invoked with an error, an array of rows, and additional metadata about the result and execution. Generally, you should check the error before iterating over the rows.
